text: Takkha Paul kei'n, Christa Jisu sik-ah chuonkatho, halli tuun Christa Jisu sik-ah mikhumna ah kaom ka-e innum,1:9: Christa Jisu sik-ah chuonkatho, halli tuun Christa Jisu sik-ah mikhumna ah kaom; emakli upa ka-eii, han Christa Jisu sik-ah tuun tuun mikhumna ah kaom. minriang jarra, kei'n nangdiang ngaidam kinani eii.
